it.unitn.ing.rista.util
Class Angles

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.rista.util.Angles
public class Angles
extends java.lang.Object

The Angles is a class providing static methods for angles translation and computation. Angles in radiants.

Since:
JDK1.1
